name: 异界旅客：序章
description:
I just want to show you a little bit of fun.
This free game on the shelf to here, mainly for the convenience of everyone to try to play.
The game's subsequent content will also continue to be updated here for free!
The game contains a dazzling variety of combat methods and content, such as melee taps and combos.
The character's hard hits, skills, flight, locking enemies, quick tumbling, etc.
Also, the game contains a wealth of enemy Ai, with large and small monsters and robots of all shapes and sizes waiting for you.
The total game process is about half an hour, a total of three levels.
The main gameplay is cool to fight strange, brain grass, experience the pleasure of easy combat.
